body: God I love this guy's lolis
@カギ Thank that explains why I thought that was Raikou on the cover
Man. That dude is so weird...
This guy is the artist of shuten and raikou in fgo
Can someone explain how the history became like this? Before fuck and fun and now that "locks" and the girls saving Asai i don't get it u.u Also Suzuhara loli is so kawaii xD

I've been waiting for this for god-knows how long. I'd like it if Raita could make more but he's probably hurting for ideas at this point.....regardless, 10/10

MistaBiggles, I attribute that to the fact that the girls are "magical girls"....take note of how they keep mentioning their hymens growing back. (I know it doesn't make any sense but its in line with the rest of the crazy magical girl shit)
Hell yes I've been waiting for this!  Also, pregnancy is a fickle thing in hentai but you get used to it--just try not to think to hard about it lol

It's baffling how throughout all 17 chapters of this series Asai has been nutting literal buckets, balls deep in these girls and despite them acknowledging the fact that it has a high chance of happening, none of them have been confirmed pregnant.

Regardless it was fucking hot, this was the best gift for the holidays
